reviewText:
This was GREAT FUN. For anyone who has driven in any parts of Italy. We stay in Toscano. The video is marvelous. I didn't get "car sick" "motion sick" or "sea sick"!
It was short sweet and we wished it was longer. Are there anymore?
We can't wait to go back to Italia! I am thankful to have this man do the filming . . .!
I'd recommend this to anyone who doesn't take themselves seriously. We have all the SERIOUS dvds too. This one was pure delight!
